overview: Calling all stripper fans! Bring the thrill of the nightclub right into your living room with these talented, agile dancing girls who wrap themselves around their pole, then take a ride on yours! Get seduced by hot lap dancers like Tasha Reign, Skin Diamond and many other sexy, swaying, wiggling gals who know exactly how to heat you up! But by far the best thing about these jiggling cuties is that they don’t stop once you’re all worked up! Live the fantasy and let these fit and flexible dancers give you the full VIP treatment!
title: Lap Dance
